policies.name: United Front
uniques: Militaristic City-States grant units [3] times as fast when you are at war with a common nation

policies.name: Planned Economy
uniques: [+100]% Production when constructing [Factory] buildings [in all cities]

policies.name: Nationalism
uniques: [+15]% Strength <for [All] units> <when fighting in [Friendly Land] tiles>

policies.name: Socialism
uniques: May buy [B17] units with [Gold] for [3] times their normal Production cost
[-15]% maintenance cost for buildings [in all cities]

policies.name: Communism
uniques: May buy [Panzer] units with [Gold] for [3] times their normal Production cost

policies.name: Order Complete
uniques: [+2 Food, +2 Production, +2 Science, +2 Gold, +2 Culture] [in all cities]
May buy [Great Engineer] units for [1000] [Faith] [in all cities in which the majority religion is a major religion] at an increasing price ([500]) <starting from the [Industrial era]>
